subject: College Athletics
Sex Crimes
Child Abuse and Neglect
Colleges and Universities
Suits and Litigation (Civil)
lead_paragraph: The university’s board authorized about $60 million to settle many of the roughly 30 outstanding claims by victims in the Jerry Sandusky child sexual abuse case.
snippet: The university’s board authorized about $60 million to settle many of the roughly 30 outstanding claims by victims in the Jerry Sandusky child sexual abuse case.
